# astgrepr

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

`astgrepr` provides R bindings to the [ast-grep](https://ast-grep.github.io/) 
Rust crate. 

```{r}
library(astgrepr)

x = astgrepr:::SgRoot$new("print('hello')\nlogger('hello', 'world', '!')", "python")
root = x$root()

root$range()

root$text()
root$is_leaf()
root$kind()
```
